CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances... 11. The Art-Craft Mantel Company's beautiful fireplace lent a homey atmosphere to their booth. Representatives are Robert Meeham, Albert Caufigure and Lester E. Cauffiell...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two women standing in front of mantel display in Artcraft Mantel Co.booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
